oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of Social Network Analysis in Innovation Research: A literature review
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: F. Coulon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Good review of methodological issues arising when using social network analysis in innovation research in general and AIS in particular. It highlight shortcomings and offers alternatives.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: capacity assesments
